website_summaries.verdict: For consumers who prefer a lightweight space-saver, this chair has the competition beat. It's only around 7 pounds and has a very desirable price.
pros: Adjustable seat, spacious tray, and 5-point safety restraints
cons: Tray takes some effort to remove and replace
Crevices in seat and strap buckles are difficult to clean
Requires a kitchen or dining chair

customer_reviews.title: Good, I want to love it- but one major cleaning setback.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking and functional chair for my little one! Now that he is more into solids though, it's a pain to clean it. The way the cushion fits (see pictures) keeps you from being able to just throw the cover in the wash. A lot of food falls into the crevices on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Harms

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting!!
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting!! Item was opened, dirty, and worsted of all it stunk of weed!!!! very disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tzuki jr.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! it works as a full size high ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! it works as a full size high chair without taking up so much space which is very important when you need 2 high chairs. I use it for my 6 month old and have been using it since he was 4 months old. So you can lay it back enough for new sitters and it sits up straighter as they get more confident. If I would have gotten this first for my older one I would have gotten two so the one full size one wouldn't take up so much space in my small dinning room.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it. It is small enough to fit in a chair and has two height selections. Takes up only the space a chair that is pulled out which is very nice!! My old high chair was like having another table at the table. My only grip about this is the back is "recline-able" but in the "upright" position it's still reclined more than I like however, the kid doesn't seem to mind. He's only 9 weeks so we're just getting him used to sitting at the table at this point he's not actually eating.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how easy it was to put this high chair together. I was also skeptical at how easy it will be to clean stains. Today I cleaned up day's old carrot puree stains from yesterday and it came right off the fabric! Just a wet dish rag and wiped it all off, made me so happy! I was already pretty happy with the simple chair design, the awesome tray design, and the modern fabric pattern, but the fact that it was truly stain resistant made my day. Had to jump on here to write this. You won't regret buying this space saving high chair!
customer_reviews.author: hl1000

customer_reviews.title: Great in many ways.
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair for my Great granddaughter. She will soon be 1 year old. This is such a great alternative to a full size high chair, which I found to be large, awkward and hard to clean. The buckles to secure the baby are genius. No more trying to bend her arms to fit through the straps. At first I didn't like that it takes two hands to remove the tray but found it was not a problem as the straps keep her secure till I put the tray down and remove her. My chairs have a padded seat and I made a pad to put over that which I can put through the washer. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, convenient, portable
customer_reviews.text: We own 2 of these because they're so convenient! One stays strapped to our kitchen chair and the other stays on the floor and we take that one with us when we travel or eat at other people's houses. However, the one we keep unattached for travel is an older version and I definitely like this newer version better! The straps are very easy to disconnect so I can take the cover off and throw it in the wash. I can also remove the straps themselves easily and wash them in the sink if needed. My son is over 1 now, and I'm looking forward to trying out the booster mode soon to see how he likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight portable high chair
customer_reviews.text: I had a really hard time deciding on what type of high chair to purchase for our son, primarily because there is such a huge variety and the price range is variable as well. We don't live in a huge house, so I was attempting to find something that did not take up a ton of floor space. I found this chair on an Amazon warehouse deal and it really appealed to me since it could sit on an existing chair. It's also very lightweight and has multiple settings which allowed him to start using it around 5 months. The seat is also very easy to take apart and wash.
customer_reviews.author: happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces, fits table perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a smaller space! We love that our little one can sit at the table with us at our same level rather than being elevated in a high chair. Recommend getting a chair pad (only about $12) to protect the chair just in case the plastic creates ware. We haven’t experienced this, but wanted to be prepared. Buckles in easy and the whole tray detaches which is nice if they’re finished, but want to continue sitting with you. Only downfall is the tray doesn’t have an inner tray that pops in and out like others so you have to take the whole tray portion to the sink to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Elicia Cano

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options
customer_reviews.text: This is our second. We have one for our first son and got another for our new baby. Love that you can put it on any chair and that the cover is removable and washable. It comes with one cover. But I bought an extra to use while I am washing the dirty one. And it’s super easy to take off. We don’t really use the straps. But nice that they are there. And can easily use with or without the tray and just pull him up to the table. Definitely love this option. Takes up less space than a stand alone high chair and a lot less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: kttiekat

customer_reviews.title: Nothing flashy, a good chair
customer_reviews.text: We began using this chair when our child was 3 months old. He enjoys sitting in it, and it is easy to get him in and out of. We are hopeful that we will continue to be able to use it as he grow. He is around 20 pounds now, and seems to fill it up! The seat securely fastens to our kitchen chairs, and we are confident in strapping him in.
customer_reviews.author: We Don't Rent Pigs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small Space.
customer_reviews.text: First I want to say, when I open the box I noticed that it looked like it was a return, Non of the pieces were wrapped in plastic, only the cover which I checked to make sure it was not dirty, when I was putting it together I noticed a few scratches like someone had a difficult time putting together. I went on line to see if I can contact Amazon I couldn’t find a contact button. I could have return it but too much of a hustle didn’t look used so I am keeping it. Granddaughter likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great option to replace a high chair.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate this reclines. It is a better option for my small kitchen than a high chair. Our 4 month old enjoys sitting at the table while we eat. He doesn’t get upset because he can see everyone’s face. When I have to work at home he can sit at the table with me and stay entertained as well
customer_reviews.author: LeeJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair, here’s why!
customer_reviews.text: Im a caregiver and I use this at my clients home. I have to say it’s nice not to have to buy a second high chair! My daughter has been in this chair since she was 8 months and she’s almost 14 months now and she still fits super comfortably as she did back then! Has the 5 star buckle system and also has retractable table top that lets you adjust according to baby’s size. Clips to any chair which is super convenient. Not to mention - super cute design! & Can be washed easily! Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bella

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this highchair because of the fact that it fits right at the table, and it's great for that reason. What I don't like about it is how annoying it is to get clean. The seat itself comes off easily and is easily washed, but the straps get so gross and are very hard to clean. Also, the tray on this is huge and even though it says it dishwasher safe, I don't think I've ever seen a dishwasher this could easily be put into. This highchair works for now, but if we have another baby I'll be looking for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every penny and more. However.....
customer_reviews.text: It sits perfect on the chair. All parts of it are very stain resistant. The tray dulls a bit too easily but I still really love this and I’ve had it almost a year. The picture is taken one year after I bought it. The shoulder straps are in perfect condition just hidden because we no longer need them. Update. Kind of frustrated. The chair is still worth the money. He’s 2 1/2 and the chair is still strong sturdy and stain resistant. However, it sits too high, even in the lowest position, to slide under the table thus making it useless as a booster seat. The picture doesn’t show the chair under the table either.
customer_reviews.author: vmac

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought as "new" I could tell that mine came lightly used. It had food stain on it and a piece of shredded cheese was chilling on it lol. It wasn't a big deal though and the rest of it was clean (most importantly, the cover was New and clean). It was easy to assemble and I did it in less than 10 minutes. It looks comfortable and has 3 different reclining positions. My boy is 4 months old at 15lbs and 25 inches long and he fits great. The tray is really easy to remove and place on. It's overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan & Brittney Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: perfect for 1 year old /sturdy/ great harness system to ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect for 1 year old /sturdy/ great harness system to keep active child safe in the seat. Tray is large with a drink holder/ easy clean up. can not say enough positive things about this chair. should have bought one earlier. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: C. Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect high chair for small space
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment and just did not have the room for a high chair. I saw this one and it is the best! I was able to set it up by myself in less than 10 minutes. It takes up little to no extra space in my apartment and my son fits great in it! Sometimes it is annoying to clean the straps, but that's a general high chair issue, it's not specific to this one. My worry was that my son wouldn't be secure in this high chair as my boy is particularly squirmy, but it is very secure!!! I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: Haywalt

customer_reviews.title: It’s Perfect for a Smaller Space
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of different high chairs before choosing this one. The selling point is the fact that it straps onto a chair and doesn’t require its own separate stand. It really is perfect for a smaller kitchen. I also love that it converts to a booster seat so we can use it as she grows. It’s also very easy to wipe down and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Not usual quality I expect from Fisher Price
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the quality of this seat. It is not up to the usual standards of Fisher Price. My son has an older version and the quality is so much better. The plastic is very thin and and I am not sure it will withstand the abuse that toddlers can deal out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: High chair that does tricks!
customer_reviews.text: Why aren't there more things in life that can be used for more than one thing?! This high chair is great! Assuming you have a chair that is can wrap around, it is pretty easy to get setup. Factory could had done a better job on cutting the plastic, but can't complain that much. Enjoy this chair will grow with my child, plus I don't have another chair I have to mess with in the kitchen, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gabel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love Fisher Price and there products are always good quality. It's easy to assemble, and the straps as well as the seat cover are removable so you can wash them. It has a lever that allows you to raise the seat by one notch if you needed it fit a higher table (or have a taller child lol), which is a nice feature. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: April Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces and traveling
customer_reviews.text: We love this high chair! It was a tremendous value for the price. It is so easy to bring with us to family members’ homes. It is relatively easy to wash the individual parts, including the straps and tray, as well. It was a bit more challenging than expected to initially assemble/install but I have antique kitchen chairs so that may have been the cause.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Maclean

customer_reviews.title: Best and most comfortable seat for babies and toddlers and won’t take up space.
customer_reviews.text: I like the seat so much because it is very comfortable for the baby it reclines for younger babies who are starting on solids and it’s also works as a booster seat for toddlers also it’s very nice you can put away easily and it doesn’t take up space like that original high chairs, I wish I would have bought it for my 2 older kids I didn’t even know it existed hahaha until now with my third. Am in love with it and I highly recommend this seat.
customer_reviews.author: carla nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: I'm on baby number four and I've gone through four other types of highchair/booster seats with the other kids. I wish I had found this seat sooner. It is perfect. It's easy to attach to our kitchen chair, easy to buckle and unbuckle our baby and easy to place and remove the tray. The fabric and buckles are simple to remove, wash in the washing machine and replace. I wish other baby/toddler products were this amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Great for our granddaughter.
customer_reviews.text: We got this high chair for our granddaughter and it is working great so far. This is a pretty classic design and we chose it over the multitude of others available online. We will update the review as she grows and it changes from a high chair to a booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: 4fromTexas

customer_reviews.title: RECYCLED PRODUCT... NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: So I never got the chance to even assemble it because the parts looked used and damaged. At first I saw the box (picture) and figured that the shipping process did that to the box but then I noticed another label from what seems to be a PREVIOUS buyer. The parts looked like they were taken apart and then just recycled for the next buyer. I’m returning it and requesting a new one... hopefully they don’t recycle another product. I suggest inspecting what you buy before using!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is great for small spaces. Overall, it is pretty flimsy and cheaply made but it gets the job done and it is definitely worth the price. Cleanup is not very easy but manageable. Nice high chair to try before investing in something more expensive and great as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Bermet Suominen

customer_reviews.title: Probably 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the kid perfectly, like that it grows with the kid. Dislike 5 point harness, makes it harder to get the kid in and out. The wife uses the shoulder straps, I simply choose not to. Because of a preference I have I give it 4 stars. My wife would probably give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: William Pichler

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Easy to clean. Love the high back on it. Also love the neutral colors. I may have a girl but I try to buy NON-pink crap.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Good support, adjustable settings for the harness depending on what baby needs, and a big tray. Things generally don't go flying instantly with the windshield wiper arms, although they still do of course lol. Putting it together took minimal effort. The cover comes off to be washed, which makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M16

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a huge kitchen so I ordered this and got rid of our full size. RIGHT CHOICE!! He can be up at the table with us or use the tray. It's easy to unstrap if you need to move it at all. Reclines for smaller babies aND still has plenty of room for my massive child to grow into it. Straps and cover are removable and washable and it's EASY! Has a stability bar on the base but our chairs have high backs so I'm not using it. Came packaged well and is my fav highchair so far (we've been through 4 different types). This one is by far the best :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah & Zach

customer_reviews.title: Space-saving must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair! It’s so easy to assemble, use, and move around. My favorite aspect is how much space it saves. I was originally going to buy the antilop ikea high chair, but realized I didn’t really have anywhere to put it. The only thing I don’t like about it is that the cover is cloth and not more of a wipable vinyl. That would really make this product a standout.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few weeks now and we are very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for a few weeks now and we are very happy with them. I was a little worried that they wouldn't be sturdy on top of our dining room chairs because the chairs have a pad on them, but that has not been the case. Our dining area is small, so we didn't have room to buy two conventional high chairs (we have twins), and this perfectly solved that problem. One small annoyance: my dining table has a lip on the bottom, so this doesn't scoot underneath the table. Not a deal breaker, just wanted to mention it to anyone else out there who may mind.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Solid for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is our main high chair and we love it. It's well-priced and portable enough (I walked 1/2 mile carrying it to a friend's house). I have been using it daily and have few complaints. My only issues with this is that it's not easy to clean. The tray just spreads food around and difficult to catch on your wet/dry towel. Secondly, we're feeding my kid a mix of lumpy to pureed foods and once it falls onto the straps, it's takes at least a couple of tries to get it clean/white again. Overall, I really like this high chair.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN0702

customer_reviews.title: 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this high chair but I won’t lie... those white straps got dirty the very first day we used it haha. I was a little upset I didn’t think about that before buying it but I honestly can’t expect it to stay clean anyways. So overall great highchair but if the whiteness of it being ruined will bother you... find one with different colored straps!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair!! I have a cosco highchair that is so hard to move around and I cannot take with me to my mom’s house. I ordered this and It fits perfectly in our car trunk alongside our big stroller. AND ican still fit my groceries! I def recommend this chair as it is easy to assemble and very handy! I love the dtraps to secure it and spacious top.
customer_reviews.author: Nohemi

customer_reviews.title: Yes, get it!
customer_reviews.text: The best $50 I ever spent on a baby thing that’s used multiple times a day. It’s perfect for small spaces, fits right under our kitchen table so you barely notice it. The fabric is easy to clean, straps are a little more tricky but that’s expected. The tray is easy to clean as well and stuff sticks to it like toys and plates. Highly recommended from happy baby and parents!
customer_reviews.author: Marin M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I love it and my baby loves it. The cover washes so easily, my baby likes to eat spaghetti-os and can get very messy very fast, i swear this cover is stain resistant. I can just wipe it with a baby wipe or wet paper towel and it comes right off! Plus its super cute and modern looking so it doesn't stand out as an odd unmatched object in our home.
customer_reviews.author: SammiCakes

customer_reviews.title: Two-hands to open.
customer_reviews.text: Not a one handed tray! Maybe I need more practice but this definitely takes two hands to remove the tray. That’s the biggest drawback. Otherwise it seems great! Make sure you have a chair that is the right dimensions and won’t tip. We are going to be looking for a different chair than what we are currently using as our baby gets a bit bigger. It is the right dimensions but doesn’t feel sturdy enough to keep from tipping when he has more weight to shift around.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good highchair
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great highchair. It's easy to clean up the cover is easy to take off and put back on. It's slightly smaller (and plastic is not as strong) than their old model so one of my babies looked like a giant in it but the smaller twin fit perfect. So if you have a chunkier baby they will still fit but may not get as long of use out of it. Overall it's a great highchair for small spaces!
customer_reviews.author: LWhitley

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! We are pretty tight on space so I thought I’d try this out. It fits perfectly on one of our kitchen chairs, and is sturdy and durable enough to hold our squirmy 7 month old very well! He loves it and seems comfortable in it. He’s been in it since about 4 months old, the reclining feature is a life saver!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Wassink

customer_reviews.title: A great back-up high chair
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this high chair for my MIL's house, since she watches our son twice a week. Our son loves it! He loves the vantage point, and does not mind sitting in it at all. It functions well, and takes up a lot less space than a typical high chair. It is easy to remove and put away. He sits up well in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, child enjoys it.
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality for what it is. The straps at the bottom of the base stay in place very well. This is used daily in our home and the straps at the bottom do not loosen so there is no fear of them coming loose and the child falling. It's easy to clean and wash. The one downside is, it's essentially a two piece and that makes it a challenge to neatly stow away somewhere. But that's not a deal breaker!
customer_reviews.author: Dina Pip

customer_reviews.title: Fits our chairs, kids comfortable. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.text: We use this one and an older model for infant twins. They fit securely on our bar stool chairs with a pub height table. Our dining room ha limited space and these are great for preserving the area we have. Our old free standing high chair went to grandma's for occasional use after we got the second one of these. Material washes nicely. Doesn't seem to shrink in the dryer. Gross stains have all come out so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to securely fasten to a chair with the provided straps, it is very lightweight and if not secured  could very easily tip
customer_reviews.text: bought this to use at my house for my grandson. It is very nice, and serves our purpose well because I did not want to have a full size highchair to keep at my house. We also used this to take with us for a visit to my mothers.
customer_reviews.author: janice saltarelli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love. This actually exceeded my expectations. I live in the city and was in need of a high chair that wouldn't take up much space! Super easy to set up and fits in any standard sized chair perfectly. Straps are adjustable and removable for easy cleaning. Seat pad is removable as well and machine washable. This has your basic table and cup holder. "Seat belts" and you can change the height and position (recliner or up straight) of the seat. My baby loves it! Also easy to carry if you're traveling with it. I honestly think I'd go with this high chair even if we didn't need something that wouldn't take up too much space
customer_reviews.author: alexa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect high chair, hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect high chair for a smaller space. Or even a big space. It doesn’t take up but one chair. We reclined it for baby food and set it up for big boy food. It was hard to keep clean given the colors are light. But other than keeping it clean or getting stains out, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Nice High Chair.
customer_reviews.text: I gave a lower score for the versatility for two reasons. First it does one job, however it does it well. and second, the crotch strap seems way to long and can't be adjusted. From being able to be used from birth to toddler i would hope you could adjust that strip.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Simon

customer_reviews.title: Grandson tested and approved!
customer_reviews.text: As grandparents we needed a chair for our grandson on his first visit. This chair fit the bill. Easy to assemble and did assemble for storage. The young man that sat in it seemed comfortable as he was not constantly attempting to escape it's confines. It's Fisher Price and they are child people.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Light weight & easy to bring along for travel
customer_reviews.text: My 9 months old using this since she is 3months and this high chair do have special features like light weight, and the high is adjustable, very easy to bring along for travel. the cover is easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bostwick

customer_reviews.title: I also love that the pad is removable and replaceable
customer_reviews.text: This is so simple. I debated on purchasing one of these or a traditional stand alone high chair. I don't regret buying this one. It's very cute and very practical. I also love that the pad is removable and replaceable. They sell the changeable pads at baby stores too. So in the long run its a good investment if you plan on having more kids in the future. It has 2 height settings which is cool and also reclines for smaller babies. It is good also because you can take it with you easily if needed, to go to grandmas or out of town. Etc.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Pelayo

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome space saver! We bought this rather than a standard high chair due to lack of space and are very happy with it. It fastens to a regular chair, so baby sits at the table with us! The reclining feature is nice as well, especially when baby is younger. We recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is amazing, it’s easy to clean, and very durable, I’ve taken it to family members houses for get together dinners, mini weekend trips and obviously we use it at home every day it comes clean easy and seems hold up very good product
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Richman

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean! 7
customer_reviews.text: I liked this chair a lot at first. We started using it When my daughter was 4 months and the recline function was helpful. We feed baby finger foods, basically holdable versions of the food eat. Half of the food ends up in the chair (not the chairs fault) but half of that food ends up under the seat. Its always a mess and you have to put it through the laundry to get it clean. Also, the handle on the tray for hanging bibs is pointless because we always need to clean the tray. I loved this for the small footprint, but that's really it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Easy to Clean, Simple
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this highchair. It has been so helpful with feeds and playtime with my twins. I can take the chairs anywhere, and they love playing and eating in it. It's a win-win! I love how the chair is so lightweight and simple, and it's easy to clean and assemble, which is a huge plus. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Came looking dirty/used. As I am pressed for time and need it for travel I had no choice but to just clean it and move on. My 9 month old fits perfectly well.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Rios

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and very compact.
customer_reviews.text: I love that the cloth part of this seat comes off so easily. Makes washing it that much more convenient. It’s easy to setup on a chair and the tray is easy to remove. It’s nice and small so we can take it to the grandparents house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Young

customer_reviews.title: Concerned with the durability but love the versatility
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super versatile but it’s not constructed well. It is a lighter weight plastic mold than I would have liked. The chair back is not solidly constructed to the base of the seat (even after tightening) so it is a little flimsy. The chair seat cover is fabric and white so even though it’s nice and bright, it’s a cleaning nightmare. Especially with the little ones who are not too coordinated and tend to make messes when learning how to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great high chair my daughter (19months) still uses it and absolutely loves it. Easy to take apart to wash straps and cover and can just wipe down the base and tray super easily! Will definitely buy another when a newest addition arrives!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca chavez

customer_reviews.title: Good for babies who like to visit!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter came to visit me for 2 weeks and I didn't want to buy an expensive high chair. This worked perfectly as we could attach it to one of our chairs at home, and her parents could take it with them when they went to visit other relatives. It is strong and well constructed. Easy to assemble and the cushion washes up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Updated version is better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandparents house and works good. We have the newer version for home and wish I had just bought another of that version. This one is more parts and the seat is smaller. Does the job but I would recommend looking at the updated style.
customer_reviews.author: HET829

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would slide under the table. It has to be used with the tray or be very careful the baby will kick the table and fall backwards! It’s otherwise comfortable for the child, easy to clean and definitely less bulky than a high chair.
customer_reviews.author: christine fortea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safe chair!! And saves space!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this high chair! It was quick and easy to assemble. Cleaning it was super nice it wipes down nicely and even the seat cover I put in with our delicates and then in the dryer on low for twenty and it’s perfect! But the chair is really great! It’s safe no pinching fingers or anything to be nervous about. So glad we went with this one! It’s good for our little apartment (perfect room saver) and it’s lightweight that I can easily take it with us on trips!👊 So happy with this and as a mom I recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Sitting Then Down To Eat
customer_reviews.text: I baby sit my niece. I needed her to learn to sit and eat verses running around. So I purchased this chair for her and it’s been a great help.
customer_reviews.author: From The Heart Of A Righteous Sinner

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not the best
customer_reviews.text: It's very bulky in all the wrong spaces. It's tight on my babies legs and I can't wash the straps. All the buttons get stuck a lot but it is easy to put on the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ke Shen

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this. It was supposed to be a gift. Delivered in the rain left at the door in original box. I have given these as baby gifts before. My twin grandchildren use them instead of regular high chairs and had no problem with them. Was very disappointed in the condition of the box
customer_reviews.author: Leslie’s 4th kindle

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this high chair. It easily attached to my dining room chair and feels very secure on it using the straps that it came with. It did not take me long to assemble. All in all I would say maybe 15 minutes including securing it to the chair. It is easy to clean and looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Snaibedai

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing. I'm so happy we bought it. My baby sits perfectly and looks like she's really comfortable. It's super easy to firstly put the chair together and it's also easy to use. The table clicks on and off and the toys I put there don't fall off that easily, because the table is a little wide. I also love that I can use the chair for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have, tried to go without for a while but I just couldn’t, easy to clean and easy straps to hold your baby up in their chair to eat with the family
customer_reviews.author: ABlanco

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s so light and I can bring it with me to restaurants. It doesn’t take up a lot of room and I love being able to put it just about anywhere. It’s a great high chair and I recommend it to anyone. It’s pretty easy to clean and my son loves sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove cover
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this high chair. We bought it for our visiting granddaughter and it served the need perfectly. It takes one minute to remove the cover, making nightly washings very doable. She absolutely loves her high chair and runs for it every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Geister

customer_reviews.title: we love it
customer_reviews.text: this is great, easy to use, wash, and move. the straps are the hardest to keep clean but if you put them in the wash machine with your laundry they come clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Gradndaughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: The white and grey color cover was easy to clean despite food stains. It was alo $10 cheaper than the dark covers. So definitely good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month granddaughter loves her new chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it fits well on my barstool! I don't have to have a large highchair taking up space.... My 5 month granddaughter fits well in it! I watch her 5 days a week and it's perfect! It doesn't fit under my counter top with the tray on it which is fine!
customer_reviews.author: Tana Hughes

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great highchair especially if you are limited on space in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great highchair especially if you are limited on space in the kitchen. It was so easy to put together, maybe 5 minutes if that. It's really easy to clean too, and works for any dinning chair and table. My daughter is two and we are using it as a toddler booster seat. I love how high it can go up so she can be sitting at our height. When my son is ready to start eating I might have to get one for him. I forgot to mention it's so light weight and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: julie prevost

customer_reviews.title: Works great on chairs, do not recommended for use on a bench.
customer_reviews.text: Great for using on a chair. We have a custom made bench and it doesn't work quite as well. Not a diss on the product, just an FYI. It is a great item and seems well designed and built. Just not designed for our bench.
customer_reviews.author: Andy McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Space saver and great
customer_reviews.text: Both my 8 month old and my 20 month old enjoy this. They are both perfectly comfortable and can reach the tray
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: We got this when our daughter was 2 months old. She sat well in it. It leans back so that little babies can sit in it. Our kitchen is on another level from the other rooms, so it was really nice to be able to put her in this, attached to a chair, and let her mingle with the family. Better than lugging around a huge highchair.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love how convertible this is and how it doesn’t take up too much space. It required a little assembly but all you need is a screwdriver. My biggest complaint is cleaning. I wish the fabric was waterproof or a plastic. It gets gross fast
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Yost

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. My son is able to sit up in it well. It is easy to wash and doesn't stain horribly. I had a small issue putting it together as the directions are unclear as to which leg is which and I had put them on the wrong way but I got it fixed easily and quickly. I still really love the product.
customer_reviews.author: sids

customer_reviews.title: Love this high chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair I wanted something that wouldn't take up much space and this was perfect for me. It is easy to clean and was easy to assemble it only needed two screws put in and that was it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea G

customer_reviews.title: Has Many Uses Other Than Just Feeding Time
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this seat and she was only 4 months old when I got it for her. She doesn't like being in a reclined position. She likes to sit straight up and this guy does the trick!! Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rika D

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Fisher price space saver seat for years that we liked a lot so when the tray started to peel from years of use and abuse, we knew we wanted to get the same seat to replace it. This seat is a little smaller and less bulky than the old one.. plastic seems a bit thinner. And this one doesn't have a one handed tray release like the old one. I'm pleased with it overall, though.
customer_reviews.author: Stop hacking me

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair. Easy to assemble. Easy to take apart to clean. I’ve had to wash the cover a few times now and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jocohow

customer_reviews.title: Save space and money
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It fits perfect on my standard dining set so I have less clutter than a large high chair. If you don’t need the extra chair, save space and money and get this.
customer_reviews.author: John O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: We returned it. The whole thing was flimsy and ...
customer_reviews.text: We returned it. The whole thing was flimsy and wobbly. It also seems to accommodate a narrow age/weight range, so you are only going to get a few months of use out of this chair. We decided to go with a wooden chair that is adjustable and meant to scale with your kid over the years.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy and not good quality. Disappointed as it has some areas of break in the first month. Definitely not the quality I expected based on other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great! My husband and I have been so pleased with the product, we purchased a second one for our new baby. The recliner settings are so easy to use, the cover comes off easily for cleaning purposes and it converts into a toddler booster seat. The only downside is that it does not compact well for travel. This does not bother us though because everything else about it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product very comfortable for taller children.
customer_reviews.text: I dont recomend it be used with light weight chairs or any stairs with a base more narrow than the back of this seat but overall great way to help kids adjust to table eating.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, space saving alternative to my cumbersome high chair. Great value! It's padded pretty well, easy to install, and lightweight. I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl818

customer_reviews.title: This item was great. You do have to assemble it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item because our baby is now 6 months and getting ready for food. We wanted something that fit on our dining room chair to save space. This item was great. You do have to assemble it, but it is very easy to do. It is also very easy to clean and wipe down went messy. It fit very easily onto our chair. He fits in it perfect and we couldn't have been happier especially with the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. Saari

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic for my 5 month old. He sits in it securely and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: BunnehGirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the tray
customer_reviews.text: I wish the tray was flat. When you take it off and set it on the table it teeters and falls if you're not careful. It has a lot of edges and nooks and crannies to clean. Great for saving space.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect High Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect high chair! Very easy to clean, assemble and very sturdy! We absolutely love this chair for our 8 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. Love it. So easy to set it up. He sits with us at the dinner table and he loves it. No balky high chair.
customer_reviews.author: LMolina

customer_reviews.title: K
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the grandparents house doesn’t take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Angela Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is great for small kitchens and will work on any chair- ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen with a high counter top and don't have room for a full on high chair. I used a space saver chair for my oldest and she's 2.5 and still uses the booster part of it. Now my little guy just started eating solids and we bought one for him as well! This is great for small kitchens and will work on any chair- tall or short!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Swan

customer_reviews.title: Good space saving solution
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and take apart for cleaning. We live in a tiny house so we needed space saving solutions and this is a great way to have a high chair without the extra furniture. We just put it on one of our dining chairs and it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nedland

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price SpaceSaver High Chair, Geo Meadow
product_meta.description:
With the Fisher-Price SpaceSaver High Chair, you get the easy-to-clean, customizable seating you love from a full-size high chair but in a super convenient, compact design that fits easily on most dining and restaurant chairs! Two height adjustments. Three recline positions. Removable, dishwasher-safe, easy to clean (and BPA free!) feeding tray. Machine-washable seat pad and five-point restraint—it’s got it all! And you can transform it into a toddler booster when your little one is ready. Plus, the Fastfinder link makes it easy to hang bibs, toys and other items you may need! When you're short on space, we've got you covered. Where development comes into play Self-Expression: High chairs help babies build confidence as they learn to feed themselves and participate in meal time. Security & Happiness: High chairs allow babies to be at eye level with their caregivers, helping them to feel secure & happy. Plus, the cushioned seat and tray keep little ones comfy during meal time.

BRAND STORY
By Fisher Price
feature_bullets: All the features of a full size high chair in half the space
Easily customizes for baby with 2-position height adjustments & reclining seat
Fastfinder link attaches bibs, toys, & more for easy take along
Removable seat back & tray (for toddler booster seat)
Secure, 5-point restraint and Dishwasher safe feeding tray insert

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,120 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
